body: Ahh no not a flake. Eric investigated this [issue](10056) and solved this in #10100. It should be backported to v1.2.x

reopening as what looks like a batch of similar errors happened today and yesterday (4/24 and 4/23)

`rst_during_data` and `rst_after_data` both show similar errors as above, and `max_streams` shows errors as below:

log in https://grpc-testing.appspot.com/job/gRPC_interop_master/12523/

```
Regression

tests.cloud_to_cloud:java:http2_server:max_streams (from grpc.tests)

Failing for the past 1 build (Since Unstable#12523 )
Took 9.6 sec.
add description
Error Message

Failure
Standard Output
```

This seems to have been the same issue reported in https://github.com/grpc/grpc/issues/10390, and was caused by too small a timeout in the Java client.
